As a seasoned parent with diverse experiences, I am interested in sharing comprehensive tips that new parents can adopt. Can you provide a JSON data format that consists of seven specific recommendations as follows?
1. Prioritize your physical and emotional well-being before attending to your baby.
2. Do not hesitate to ask for help from family, friends or professionals when parenting becomes overwhelming.
3. Create a predictable routine to enhance consistency and predictability in your baby's life.
4. Prepare ahead of time and get organized to avoid stress in daily tasks.
5. Promote good behavior in children by setting clear boundaries and employing positive reinforcement techniques.
6. Allocate time for your partner and self-care to avoid burnout and maintain a healthy relationship.
7. Embrace and celebrate every moment of the unique and rewarding parenting journey.
